de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers
Class SpotMarker

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.Marker
      de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.SpotMarker

public class SpotMarker
extends Marker

This Marker is meant to look like a spotlight. It simply draws a tapered rectangle under the feet of the agent. The marker grows and changes it's alpha value in a pulsating animation that will take your breat away. Or not. Whatever. No one understands art.

Author:
Miquel Martin

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

SpotMarker

public SpotMarker(Trackable t)
Draws a pulsating wedge (that's some description) under the given Trackable. The wedge pulsates in width and opacityangle to ratete. The color is set to DEFAULT_COLOR.

Parameters:
t - the Trackable to put the marker on

SpotMarker

public SpotMarker(Trackable t,
                  String colorString)
Draws a pulsating wedge (that's some description) under the given Trackable. The wedge pulsates in width and opacity. The color is set to colorString.

Parameters:
t - the Trackable to put the marker on
colorString - the String representing the color of the SpotMarker (e.g. #CC0000)
Throws:
InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC gc)
Draw the spot marker. Note that it expands and fades at each redraw, to produce an animated effect.

Specified by:
draw in class Marker
Parameters:
gc - the gc used to draw the spot marker
